thread.title: These Viewed A $568K House, A $1.3 Million House A $10 Million House To See Which Was The Most Worth It
thread.title_full: These People Viewed A $568K House, A $1.3 Million House And A $10 Million House To See Which Was The Most Worth It

author: Kevin J. Nguyen, Izzy Francke, Keith Habersberger, Quinta Brunson
title: These Viewed A $568K House, A $1.3 Million House A $10 Million House To See Which Was The Most Worth It
text:
View this image › 
BuzzFeed Video ID: 10768141 3. Keith and Quinta were especially impressed by the spacious new kitchen and the shower with ample room ;). “It’s like a sexy walk-in shower.”
ID: 10768176 4. The second house they went to was up in Hollywood Hills and was valued at $1,329,000. There were three bedrooms and three bathrooms. It was 1728 square feet. View this image › 
BuzzFeed Video ID: 10768200 5. Every bedroom had gorgeous views — the kids’ room even had their own private balcony! View this image › 
BuzzFeed Video What a brat! Just kidding.
ID: 10768252 6. The real selling point was the beautiful master bedroom with its massive walk in closet and matching his ‘n hers sinks. View this image › 
BuzzFeed Video ID: 10768277 7. And, there was a great deck for having parties. Check Quinta’s party face. View this image › 
Buzzfeed Video ID: 10768308 8. The third house was a Malibu mansion valued at 10 million. It had nine bedrooms, eleven bathrooms, a movie theatre, a bar, a pool and a buncha other cool stuff. It was 10,000 square feet. View this image › 
Buzzfeed Video ID: 10768320 9. Keith never wanted to leave the pristine and decked out kitchen. And Quinta was blown away by the huge master bedroom which had a wrap-around balcony and a bathroom with a sauna. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10768373 10. In short, it was the stuff of dreams. View this image › 
BuzzFeedBlue ID: 10768405 11. All of the houses were lovely, but at the end of the day, they each had to pick the one they felt was the most “worth it.” Quinta picked the Hollywood Hills one because of the spacious rooms and the ~views~. Keith went with the Alhambra house because it was the most realistic and had everything he would need in a home. ID: 10768417 12. Good picks! Let’s look at one more pic of them living their best life in Malibu, though: View this image › 
BuzzFeed Video Cute.
ID: 10768437 13. Special thanks to Eric and Phil from Missig Nam and Associates for being such great realtors. View this image › 
Buzzfeed Video ID: 10768442 14. Check out a new episode of flagship series on BuzzFeed Video: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=DWq_sSSWWSI . ID: 10769269
